1:
RESTRICTED 
NO.CAS-9(15)2008-AEP 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated: 29/9/2008 
 
 
AVSEC ORDER NO. 2/2008 
 
 
Subject: Authorisation for issue of Airport Entry Pass. 
 
 
Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation 
Security (BCAS), in pursuance to Rule 90 of Aircraft Rules, 1937; and in exercise 
of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act 1934 delegated to him vide 
Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated July 
3, 1997 for the purpose of securing the safety of aircraft operation, do hereby 
authorize the officers of the rank of  Sub-Inspector and above of BCAS to issue 
Airport Entry Pass for entry in to Civil Airports; and civil enclaves at defence 
controlled airports in the country. 
 
2. 
This order shall be implemented with immediate effect and will remain 
valid up till the end of December 2008. 
 
 
( M.Malaviya ) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
Distribution : As per list attached.
